title: 087 - Movie Theaters... Kind Of Officially Dead
description: On today’s show, the boys chat about how much Halloween has changed since they were kids, before diving into a Pod FOD that includes a myriad of topics including movie theaters kind of officially being dead, decide which movie from the last 20 years they would eliminate forever, chat about the Marvel universe and where it’s going from here, Gumpy’s work on some of biggest yachts in Canada, and much more. Plus, Nick unleashes a new collection of Friday Bangerz to the playlist to help send you into the best weekend ever. Subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for full episodes of this show (if you’re a McAfee Mafia member) and everything else PMI as we close in on 1 million subscribers and a $100,000 giveaway. Keep sending your questions for the Pod FOD into @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. Thanks for listening, have a great weekend.
